Resource.DiscogsExplanation: Go to https://www.discogs.com/settings/developers. Create an account and generate a token using 'Generate new token' button.

Resource.DoYouWantToRestartApplication: Do you want to restart application?
Resource.FirstTimeTokenMessage: Please provide a Discogs Token to start using Music Cover Finder
Resource.HowToDiscogsToken: How to get a Discogs Token
